question: In the Service Marketing Triangle, ________ occurs when employees and customers associate and communicate.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Customer satisfaction is a component of the service-profit chain model, not the Service Marketing Triangle.
That’s not correct. External service marketing refers to the promotion of an organization’s services in the external environment where the company promotes its services to customers.
That’s not correct. Internal service marketing involves motivating employees to work as a team to make customers satisfied.
Interactive marketing occurs when employees and customers interact. It is there where the promises made during external marketing are either kept, broken, or exceeded by employees.

detailedSolution: Interactive marketing occurs when employees and customers interact. It is there where the promises made during external marketing are either kept, broken, or exceeded by employees.
